column1: You can use Ctrl +/- (or Ctrl+Scroll) to zoom in and out and Ctrl+0 to reset.
column2: 你可以使用Ctrl +/- (或 Ctrl+滚轮)来缩放大小，使用Ctrl+0来重置

column1: This field also supports different colors.  Using the caret symbol (^) followed by a Hex code or a number (0-9) will set the color.
column2: 此区域也支持不同颜色。使用后面跟着十六进制代码或数字(0-9)的插入符(^)可以设定颜色。
